text:
trying to install websh using 'make install' fails: the prefix for the 
installation of the docs is ignored (the makke file tries to install the docs 
to /docs).

In addition, applying 'make install DESTDIR=/some/path', the installation of 
the docs also fails, because the docs themselves are not complete (missing 
*.txt) and the binaries are installed to $DESTDIR/$PREFIX/bin instead of 
$DESTDIR/bin (same for libs)
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch

text:
i am trying to install aparche MSI. the installation wizard comes up but it 
will not run. the next buton is disabled and it will not function. i cant moe 
to the next step.

text: done to a reasonable degree (for Websh 3.6.0)
